channel.title: Shiny on Forty
channel.description: Recent content in Shiny on Forty

item.title: Visualizing Personal Use
item.description: This project is a follow-on to my previous bikesharviz project, where I mentioned creating another app to enable users to quickly visualize their own ridership. This app enables users to gather their data through webscraping, then server-side processing to generate the cycling routes, and then client-side customization of the rendered graphic. Check out the app at https://bikeshareviz.shinyapps.io/personal_bikesharedata/ Data This Shiny app relies on webscraping user ride history from the CaBi website using the rvest package.
